data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fu, Lina, Jin, Chi, Zhang, Feng (2014): Three new species of the genus Otacilia Thorell (Araneae: Phrurolithidae) from China. Zootaxa 3869 (4): 483-492, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3869.4.10
